verses.name: John 14:28
verses.text: Ye have heard how I said unto you, I go away, and come again unto you. If ye loved me, ye would rejoice, because I said, I go unto the Father: for my Father is greater than I.

verses.name: John 14:29
verses.text: And now I have told you before it come to pass, that, when it is come to pass, ye might believe.

verses.name: John 14:30
verses.text: Hereafter I will not talk much with you: for the prince of this world cometh, and hath nothing in me.
